verses.verse: Let <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5360>love<s%> of the brethren <S%G3306>continue<s%>.

<S%G1950><s%> <S%G1950>Forget<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to show love unto <S%G5381>strangers<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> thereby3778, 1223 <S%G5100>some<s%> have <S%G3579>entertained<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2990>unawares<s%>.

Remember <S%G3403><s%> them that are in <S%G1198>bonds<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> bound with <S%G4887>them<s%>; them that are <S%G2558>ill-treated<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%>.

Let <S%G1062>marriage<s%> be had <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5093>honor<s%> among <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> let the <S%G2845>bed<s%> be <S%G283>undefiled<s%>: <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G4205>fornicators<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3432>adulterers<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2919>judge<s%>.

Be <S%G5158>ye<s%> free from the <S%G866>love<s%> of <S%G714>money<s%>; content with such things as ye <S%G3918>have<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> hath <S%G2046>said<s%>, I <S%G447>will<s%> in <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3361>wise<s%> <S%G447>fail<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, neither will I in <S%G3756>any<s%> <S%G3361>wise<s%> <S%G1459>forsake<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>.

So <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3004>with<s%> good <S%G2292>courage<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1698>my<s%> <S%G998>helper<s%>; <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G5399>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%>: <S%G5101>What<s%> shall <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>?

Remember <S%G3421><s%> them that had the rule <S%G2233>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G3748>men<s%> that <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>; and <S%G333>considering<s%> the <S%G1545>issue<s%> of <S%G3739>their<s%> <S%G391>life<s%>, <S%G3401>imitate<s%> their <S%G4102>faith<s%>.
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5504>yesterday<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4594>to-day<s%>, yea <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>.

Be <S%G4064><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> carried <S%G4064>away<s%> by <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3581>strange<s%> <S%G1322>teachings<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2570>that<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G950>established<s%> by <S%G5485>grace<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> by <S%G1033>meats<s%>, wherein3739, 1722 they that <S%G4043>occupied<s%> themselves <S%G5623>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5623>profited<s%>.
We <S%G2192>have<s%> an <S%G2379>altar<s%>, whereof3739, 1537 they <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> that <S%G3000>serve<s%> the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G2226>of<s%> <S%G5130>those<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> is <S%G1533>brought<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the holy <S%G39>place<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%> as an offering <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, are <S%G2618>burned<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G3925>camp<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G4439>gate<s%>.
Let us <S%G5106>therefore<s%> go <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> the <S%G3925>camp<s%>, <S%G5342>bearing<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3680>reproach<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> an <S%G3306>abiding<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> we <S%G1934>seek<s%> after the city which is to <S%G3195>come<s%>.

Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> let us <S%G399>offer<s%> up a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> of <S%G133>praise<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1275>continually<s%>, <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G5491>of<s%> <S%G5491>lips<s%> which make <S%G3670>confession<s%> <S%G3686>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> to do <S%G2140>good<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2842>communicate<s%> <S%G1950>forget<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> with <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is well <S%G2100>pleased<s%>.

Obey <S%G3982><s%> them that have the rule <S%G2233>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5226>submit<s%> to <S%G1063>them<s%>: for <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G69>watch<s%> in <S%G5228>behalf<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> they that shall <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> with <S%G4727>grief<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> were <S%G255>unprofitable<s%> for <S%G5213>you<s%>.

Pray <S%G4336><s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> we are <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>, <S%G2309>desiring<s%> to <S%G390>live<s%> <S%G2573>honorably<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you the more <S%G4056>exceedingly<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may be <S%G600>restored<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G5032>sooner<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%>, who brought <S%G321>again<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4166>shepherd<s%> of the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> with <S%G1242>the<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of an <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%>, even <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>,

make <S%G2675><s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2675>perfect<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>thing<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>, <S%G4160>working<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>us<s%> that which is <S%G2101>well-pleasing<s%> <S%G1799>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1799>sight<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G430>bear<s%> with the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2532>exhortation<s%>, <S%G1063>for<s%> I have <S%G1989>written<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> few <S%G1024>words<s%>.

Know <S%G1097>ye<s%> that our <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> hath been set at <S%G630>liberty<s%>; <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5032>shortly<s%>, I will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> them that have the rule <S%G2233>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>. <S%G782>They<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2482>Italy<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.
